text: (My life is always the same, working a boring nine to five job, not really going out or doing anything interesting.)
(I finally decided to take a break and enjoy myself, I took a vacation from work, got my car and went to the beach to relax.)
(Ah, the sun on my face, the sand beneath my feet and a nice drink to top it off, no better way to spend some me-time.)
(I could go for a little swim, I just hope I didn't forget how.)
(Hmmm, looks like I got a little too far from shore. I should start getting back just in case.)
(Oh no, I got a cramp in my left butt cheek, it hurts so much, I can't move my leg.)
(I can't continue to swim, I'm gonna drown.)
(I didn't even get to see my dad again since he left for cigarettes 18 years ago.)
Are you okay?
Hopefully we got him out on time.
If he dies, he dies.
*Cough Cough Cough*
Where am I? What happened?
You were drowning.
We got you out of the water.
AAAH!!! WHAT ARE YOU? HOW ARE YOU TALKING TO ME?
We saved you, and that's how you react? Hmph.
Sorry sorry, I was just surprised that you can talk. Who are you anyway?
My name is Bubbles. I am a crab.
I’m Faith, the duck.
The pufferfish over there is Becky.
That's Rebecca to you!
When will we send this trash to the Goldenfish?
Why does she need trash?
She meant you.
Don't worry, Becky is always like that towards new people.

options.text: How do you know each other?
Who is the Goldenfish?
Would you be my girlfriends?

text: Well it's a long story.
*5 hours later*
And that's how we met.
She is a fish that's golden and she has a story to tell you.
You pervert! *Slap*
Come on, we have to start moving.
Let’s go.
It won’t take us long to get there.
Oh look at that, It’s my favorite park over there. I didn’t know it was this close to the surface.
Bubbles we don’t have time for this.

options.text: Why do you love this place so much Bubbles?
What's your favorite place Becky?
Let her have some fun Faith. You must have a favorite place too.

text: She loves the surface world.
SHUT UP BUBBLES!
It has really fun playground and merry go round.
I do, it’s my rooftop. No one bothers me there.
Anyway we must hurry to Goldie, we can come back here later.
You promise?
I do.
Can you tell me something more about this Golden fish?
She’s like a super important fish
She is the smartest fish in the sea.
Okay, so why are we going there?
I told you, she has a really important story to tell you.
Important story? What could that be?
She didn’t tell us, but I think she mistook you for someone important.
Becky be nice, we don’t need your mood now.
Hmph.
(Important story you say? I can’t wait to hear it. But after these three, I don’t think that anything can surprise me anymore.)
I heard that she’s gonna read you your destiny. Just don’t get too excited.
I can see her cave from here.
(I’m getting kinda nervous. What kind of destiny could be in store for me? Should I be taking this seriously at all?)
Hey guys, what do you know about this Goldenfish? Is this destiny thing super serious? Should I be worried?
(The three of them just looked at each other. Uh-oh.)
The Goldenfish prophecies are not to be taken lightly, an encounter with her could change the course of your life, but it’s important that you hear what she has to say.
You can do it, be brave, I believe in you!
Just go with it, no use trying to fight destiny.

(I’m still nervous. *deep breath* Here goes nothing. Huh, I expected something more from this place, it’s just one big room with a pool in the middle. There’s something big in the pool. Wait, that’s a huge fish, a goldfish.)
Step forth, I’ve been waiting for you, chosen one.
(That must be the Goldenfish.)
What do you mean “chosen one”?
You are here for a reason. I will speak your destiny now.
(What is she doing? Is that a plastic bag coming out of the pool? And it’s completely dry! Oh now she’s pulling out what looks like an old receipt and reading it...)
You are to become the king of the seas, and rule over all the waters and creatures that inhabit them.
Whaaat? What are you saying? I’m just a lonely human guy, that can’t be my destiny!

Silence! I have spoken. This which “cannot be your destiny” is your destiny nonetheless, and you have no choice in the matter. Furthermore, you must select a partner (she gestures at Bubbles, Faith and Becky standing right behind me) to rule at your side. You must make this choice before you leave this cave, and you must embark on a date with your chosen partner immediately.
(It looks like they are shocked as I am. This is all so sudden, how am I supposed to make this kind of choice right here right now?)
What if I chose you, the Goldenfish, as my date?

You would offer this honour to ME? In place of a king of the seas, you would have a queen to rule over the oceans and lands of this world? (She begins to shine even more brightly than before, blinding me and the others.) Yes, with the power of the seas, and my omniscience, I would become truly eternal and all-powerful. (The light dies down suddenly.)
Hah! I refuse your offer, human. This story doesn’t need a supervillain. Now make your choice quickly, and leave this place.

(What the heck was that? And how am I supposed to make a choice? I kinda wish all three of them could be my girlfriends… Bubbles is fun and quirky, Faith is dark and edgy, and Becky seems all frigid but I know she has a good heart underneath.)
I choose...

options.text: I choose Bubbles.
I choose Faith.
I choose Becky.

text: Oooh, we’re gonna have so much fun, you’ll see! You’ll never have a boring time with me! Hey, I have an idea, I’m hungry, so let’s go get dinner? I know the best restaurant around!
Huh, I never thought you’d choose me, I thought you kinda hated me… Well, I’ll do my best I guess. Hey, have you ever seen an abandoned shipwreck? Do you want to?
… Fine, I guess it’s up to you. But you should know, I won’t make it easy! Lemme help you out just this once though. How about we go up to the surface? I wanna show you something.
(I can’t help but feel a little guilty for leaving the others behind. But I really like this crab, she’s a special one, I even feel like she could be--)
Did you know that crabs are the ultimate life form?
Huh?
Yup! It’s called carcinisation, it’s the tendency for nature to evolve a crustacean into the perfect crab-like shape. She grins and flexes her claws with excitement.

options.text: What about animals that eat crabs, like birds and big fish, aren’t they superior creatures?
That’s cool.
Yeah I already knew that.

text: Well, when you say it like that… (I’m such a fool. I guess I should be more supportive of my girlfriend instead of trying to be right all the time. I should think of a way to fix this.)
I know right?
Oh... Well alright then
Hey are you more of a pistol shrimp or mantis shrimp person?
(Her eyes light up.)

Oooh, mantis shrimp are so cool, those eyes with over a dozen photoreceptors! They can probably see colours we can’t even imagine! And those powerful clubbed claws… Oh but now that I mention claws, pistol shrimp are wicked! Did you know they can click their claws so powerfully that it creates a shockwave which stuns other creatures? IMAGINE--
*5 hours later*
So yeah, I’d have to say... I love them both!
(Wow, that went on for a while, but I’m glad she’s in a good mood again. We’re already at the restaurant.)
I have a surprise for you, I got us the best table.
The one closest to the bathroom for convenience?
Exactly! So what do you wanna eat?
Pasta! Spaghetti al dente!
Hey hot stuff, what’ll you be having today?
(Uh-oh, Bubbles looks super upset all of a sudden.)
Actually, we’d like a few minutes in private to decide.

options.text: You don’t have to worry about things like that Bubbles. You’re the only person I want to be with, and nothing will change that.
I’m on this date with you, not her.
Listen up you silly crab, you are much better than that lobster. Crabs are the ultimate life form, you said it yourself.

text: Y-you fool, you know lobsters are biologically immortal right? She would probably make you happy forever, I couldn’t compete with that.
I see, so you’re just stuck with me.
Huh, I guess you are right, I did say that. Yes I’m better than lobster, no, better than anyone.
I don’t care about that at all, I only care about you.
(There’s that beautiful smile again. We share a big bowl of spaghetti, have a lovely time and tell jokes and fun facts all night. After we finish, over drinks, Bubbles gets a little serious.)
Hey, I know you have a destiny to fulfill and all but… But I really wish you could just stay with me, down here!
I… I wish I could stay here too! I wish I could be with you forever!

(Aaah, what’s this blinding light? I feel like every cell in my body is about to explode! What the heck! I feel like my body is twisting and turning inside-out! The light disappeared, I can see again. Wait. I HAVE CLAWS!?)
(Our wishes came true, and I am a crab now! I’m finally truly happy.)
THE END

options.text: Start over

text: (I can’t help but feel a little guilty for leaving the others behind. But I really want to get to know this duck. I feel like only she could truly understand my own dark side. And also maybe I could help her be happier with her life.)
Sooo, do you have any hobbies?
Not really.
(She really doesn’t know how to keep a conversation going huh… I guess I’ll have to try harder.)
What about clubs and restaurants? Do you like going out?
Nah, just the shipwreck.
So you just like… Vibe there?
I usually put on some music.
Oooh, what music do you listen to?
Don’t bother, probably nothing you’ve ever heard of.
Try me.
Well there’s duck metal, duck progressive rock, duck industrial…

options.text: Yeah, I also listen to all of those!
Yikes, I’ve never heard of any of those… But I’d like to take a listen if you’re into them, I might enjoy it too.
Wow, I’ve never heard of those, but they sound like they suck…

text: Ugh, you poser, those are obviously not real genres. You’re worse than my parents.
*sigh* ok I lied, none of those are actually real. But thanks for taking an interest in my tastes I guess. I’ll put on my actual favourite music when we get to the shipwreck.
You know what man? You suck. I’m putting on my music anyway, and you can just deal with it.
(We walk pretty much in silence the rest of the way.)
Wow, that’s one wicked shipwreck!
Yeah, it’s whatever. Let me put that music on.
(This music is kinda hard to listen to, but I also kinda enjoy it more and more as it goes.)
So real talk, this is actually your favourite place isn’t it? I get the feeling you spend a lot of time here, don’t you? What about spending time with your family or meeting new people?

I just like it here. Also my parents suck, they act like they’re so caring but they actually know nothing about me. Also meeting new people is more stressful than it’s worth. I already have two friends and even they don’t really like me. I could die here and nobody would care or even notice.
(What am I supposed to say to that?)

options.text: Maybe you’re right. So what do you even live for then?
Do you really think that, or do you just have a hard time accepting that people care about you?
I care about you. And more importantly, your friends care about you, it’s easy to see that.

text: Dude that’s not cool. I guess I’m just waiting to see if it gets more interesting.
I guess I haven’t thought about it that way.

Look Faith, I have something to admit, I’m actually not so different from you. I live a boring life, work a boring job, and don’t really hang out with anyone ever. That was yesterday, but now all of a sudden I’m destined to become “king of the seas” or whatever? I guess what I’m trying to say is, we all have potential to become something great, and you never really know what tomorrow brings, and sometimes you just have to blow off work and go to the beach.
So what do you propose?
Maybe just try one new thing from time to time?
Ok. Right now I’ll just try to accept that you chose me as your girlfriend, and feel good about that.
Awesome. You know, telling you about my life made me realize, I don’t really wanna go back. This place is much cooler than my home, and I really trust you.
Fine then. But don’t complain about the music or the messiness or anything else, I have this place the way I like it. By the way I trust you too.

(Aaah, what’s this blinding light? I feel like every cell in my body is about to explode! What the heck! I feel like my body is twisting and turning inside-out! The light disappeared, I can see again.)
(I see a smile. Is Faith smiling?) Wh-- what just happened? You're a duck now?
I guess our strong connection allowed me to take the same form as you. Now we can truly live together as equals.
THE END

options.text: Start over

text: So, what did you want to show me?
Well since Bubbles revealed my secret that I love the surface world, I figured I should show you the place that I love the most.
(What could her favorite place really be? Wait... Is that an Amusement park?)

options.text: Could it be that you want to visit an Amusement park? Isn’t that a little childish?
Wow, I didn’t know that there was an Amusement park this close to the beach. Do you want to check it out?
Oh it’s an Amusement park. I’ve been in one of those a few years ago

text: It’s not, you idiot. I’ve never been there but I’ve always wanted to check it out. Hmph.
Really, you would do that for me? Thank you so much.
Oh you’ve been there? Then you probably don’t want to go. Shame, I thought that we could spend some time there.
Well then, it’s settled. We are going to the Amusement park.
Yes! But wait. How am I supposed to leave the water and go with you?
Well I brought The Plastic Bag with me. I can fill it with water and you can hop in.
Please do. It’s not like I’ll enjoy that, but it’s our only option.
(What would be best to place to start our date? Should I ask her?)
Hey Becky. What would you like to see first?
Everything. I want to see all of it at once.
Then I know the perfect thing to start with.
What is that?
The ferris wheel. The highest point in the amusement park and best view comes with it.
Really? Thank you.
(This is the first time that I see her this excited. She usually gives me the cold shoulder.)
How do you like the view?
It's really amazing.

options.text: I’m glad you like it.
It’s not as amazing as you.
Huh, you are easily impressed.

text: I’m glad that you picked me. Thank you for everything.
Don’t say stuff like that you idiot.
That’s not true. You are not good enough to impress me. Hmph.
Well anyway, I’m glad that I could make your wish come true. It would be nice if you could spend time on the surface forever.
I would love that too, but fish can’t be out of water for too long.
We’ll find a way to make it work.
(What is that bright light? I can’t see anything.)
Hey, what’s going on? What’s happening to me? I feel really strange.
(The light is disappearing, I can see again.)
What happened? You look like you’ve seen a ghost.
Rebecca? Ummm, please don't freak out, but take a look in the mirror.
What?! I’m human, I’m human!!! This is perfect. Now we can live together in the surface world.
Oh, um... I mean, this is okay, I guess this is acceptable.
No. It’s more than okay. It’s perfect. You can finally live as a human with me.
THE END

options.text: Start over
